title: Contact
subtitle: Get in touch for research collaboration, academic inquiries, or general questions
collaboration_subtitle: I welcome collaboration opportunities in the following areas:
collaboration_note: Feel free to reach out if you have interesting research ideas, data collaboration opportunities, or if you're interested in jointly applying for research grants.
quick_contact_desc: For the fastest response, please send me an email directly. Include the following information to help me respond more effectively:
subject_line_desc: Clear and specific subject (e.g., 'Research Collaboration Inquiry', 'Academic Question')
purpose_desc: Brief description of your inquiry or collaboration interest
timeline_desc: Any relevant deadlines or preferred response timeframe
response_time: I typically respond to emails within 2-3 business days.
